user_input: Modify the TJ Sectoral Model. Create a Nuclear SMR Generators in Germany (DE01) with a capacity of 1000 MW. Clone the Nuclear SMR in Nuclear
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the TJ Sectoral Model specifications.

tasks.description: Clone the existing Nuclear SMR generator from the 'Nuclear' group using the clone pipeline.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request, select the appropriate Nuclear SMR generator from the 'Nuclear' group.

tasks.description: Update the cloned generator's capacity property to 1000 MW.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Identify and select the capacity property of the cloned Nuclear SMR generator for update.

tasks.description: Update the cloned generator's location property to 'Germany (DE01)'.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Identify and select the location property of the cloned Nuclear SMR generator for update.
